Neanthes lamellosa
Ehlers, 1868
.
DISTRIBUTION : NA .
DISTRIBUTION : NA , CA.

NEW
RECORDS
: BM 2 , BM 3 , BM 5 , BM 6 , BM 8 , BM 9 , BM 18 , BM 19 , BM 73 , BM 80 , BM 82 , BM 83 , BM 84 , BM 85 , BM 86 , BM 87 , BM 88 , BM 89 , BM 99 .

REMARKS : These are the first records from the Adriatic Sea.
Núñez ( 2004 )
considered the distribution of this species as uncertain, as it was normally considered as a synonymy of
Nereis splendida (Fauvel, 1923 )
, and probably it was also confused with
N. pulsatoria (Savigny, 1822 )
.

DEPOSITED MATERIAL : BM 3 ,
23.07. 2007
, 2 spec. (PMR- 17628 ). BM 9 , 0 1.08. 2007 ., 2 spec. (PMR- 17616 ).

;

.
NEW
RECORDS
: BM 4 .

REMARKS : Alien species with the Indo-Pacific origin (
Zenetos et al. 2010
). In the Mediterranean Sea it was reported for the first time by
Ben-Eliahu ( 1972 )
in Haifa ( Israel ) and considered to be a Lessepsian migrant. DEPOSITED MATERIAL : BM 1 ,
30.07. 2007
, 1 spec. (PMR- 17642 ).
DISTRIBUTION : NA , CA, SA.
